vulnerability.name: USN-4705-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4705-1 fixed a vulnerability in Sudo. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Sudo incorrectly handled memory when parsing command  lines. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain unintended  access to the administrator account. (CVE-2021-3156)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in Sudo. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
